titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enter into an agreement with the Arch Hurley Conservancy District in New Mexico, authorizing the District to prepay any amounts outstanding under water reclamation repayment contracts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.
Executive Comment Requested from Bur Reclamation.

bill.summary: 1/21/1997--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to enter into an agreement authorizing the Arch Hurley Conservancy District, New Mexico, to prepay any amounts outstanding under repayment contracts with the United States with respect to the Tucumcari water reclamation project.
